programmes.show_description: In Snohomish County in 1972, a young woman is discovered covered in blood by the road. She is taken to hospital where she passes away a short time later. S4, Ep16
A woman suspects her mum of double murder. Years later, courtroom drama and new testimony reignite the case. This special episode features extensive testimony. S37, Ep31
As New Orleans braces for Hurricane Katrina, a local bar owner, Joe Wongchoy, is found shot to death in his apartment. S3, Ep4
...Accident? The case of Leslie Neulander, who died at home in the arms of her husband Dr Robert Neulander, following a 911 call by their daughter, Jenna. S1, Ep8
Two young men are attempting to set a world record rowing the Atlantic, when a freak wave capsizes their boat. S5, Ep10/20
A group of hikers are enjoying a day on Dartmoor when one falls, landing on rocks below. S5, Ep9/20
Nick Knowles tells the emotional story of a dad, and his 12 year old daughter, lost overnight on a glacier in freezing temperatures. S5, Ep11/20
Nick Knowles tells the story of two best friends who plunge down a cliff face in Cornwall on a late night walk. S5, Ep12/20
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
A woman claims she caught her boyfriend at a hotel with another woman and submits video evidence of him allegedly trying to break into her house. S21, Ep217
A woman files for a restraining order against her boyfriend after he allegedly throws a boot at her and bruises her. S21, Ep218
A woman sues her deceased grandson's former fiancée for the cost of a headstone after a $10,000 life insurance pay-out. S21, Ep219
A defendant is ill-prepared for questions from the Judge when she is sued by her ex-roommate for a security deposit. S21, Ep220
A pregnant woman accuses her brother of stranding her in Maryland while she was working for his trucking business; both want to stop the drama. S24, Ep137
A midwife makes the hard call to stay with a client whose baby just died instead of attending to a woman just beginning a difficult labour. S24, Ep138
A woman's jealous rage leads to a computer allegedly being thrown across the room and a cellphone being crushed. S24, Ep139
A couple move in with mum to improve credit scores and save for a new home; unfortunately, a fight over money and tools divide them. S24, Ep140
A man denies destroying property and sues his ex-landlord for throwing everything he owned out on the street. S18, Ep193
After a practical joke in the workplace goes wrong co-workers fight over who is responsible for medical damages. S18, Ep194
A scooter, parked at a school bus stop, takes off and is damaged when a 10-year-old girl accidentally hits the accelerator; her parents are sued for damages. S18, Ep195
A married couple and their eight children are sued by an ex-landlord for property damage and a stolen phone. S21, Ep252
A mini pit bull and his owner are allegedly attacked by a 50-pound dog that was being walked by a six-year-old child. S21, Ep253
After paying rent and a security deposit on a new apartment, a woman decides not to move in; her landlord keeps the money. S21, Ep254
Ex-lovers fight over the alleged abuse of a beloved cat that was long overdue for a trip to the vet. S21, Ep255
After a man's jaw is allegedly broken during a fight at a party, he sues for pain and suffering; the host claims he was drunk, belligerent and aggressive. S21, Ep256
A woman sues a dog breeder for return of money she paid for a puppy, vet bills, travel costs and alleged fraud. S21, Ep257
A man who owns and manages 44 properties is sued by a tenant for the return of her deposit after he failed to show up for a housing inspection. S21, Ep258
The Judge orders a woman to hand over her dog to its co-parent in a contentious custody fight involving dead puppies and alleged emergency neutering. S24, Ep153
An RV owner is accused of messing up the festival camp vibe by refusing to pay for his girlfriend's camping fees. S24, Ep154
A man accuses a costume designer of delivering a shoddy product; the designer sues for slander and claims he received death threats. S24, Ep155
An impatient mother causes her son to be arrested and spend nine days in jail when she reports his work vehicle as stolen. S24, Ep156
We examine the tragic case of Georgia Williams, a 17-year-old from Shropshire, who was murdered by Jamie Reynolds, a disturbed individual who meticulously planned her death. S1, Ep9
A woman suspects her mum of double murder. Years later, courtroom drama and new testimony reignite the case. This special episode features extensive testimony. S37, Ep32
A pop-up storm in South Carolina may give investigators a direction to go in when the unknown perpetrator of a heinous triple murder leaves behind a trail of muddy footprints. S3, Ep5
Luke Harlow met schoolgirl Kayleigh Haywood on Facebook. After exchanging 2,600 messages over 13 days, he enticed Kayleigh back to his flat, with tragic consequences. S1, Ep2
In Willoughby, Ohio in 1980, Mark Madger comes home to find his wife Nadine lying in a pool of her own blood with a kitchen knife embedded in her chest. S4, Ep17
In 1985, a young woman is awoken by an intruder in her apartment, who steals her valuables and sexually assaults her at gun-point. S4, Ep18
A woman suspects her mum of double murder. Years later, courtroom drama and new testimony reignite the case. This special episode features extensive testimony. S37, Ep32
A pop-up storm in South Carolina may give investigators a direction to go in when the unknown perpetrator of a heinous triple murder leaves behind a trail of muddy footprints. S3, Ep5
Luke Harlow met schoolgirl Kayleigh Haywood on Facebook. After exchanging 2,600 messages over 13 days, he enticed Kayleigh back to his flat, with tragic consequences. S1, Ep2
Nick Knowles tells the story of a professional British cyclist involved in a horrific collision with a race support vehicle. S5, Ep13/20
Rescuers rush to the aid of a group of people swept out to sea, only to be dragged in themselves. S5, Ep14/20
A dash cam captures the moment three cars collide on a mountain road, and, a bullock on the pitch nearly hits a village cricket team for six! S5, Ep15/20
A family searching for their lost dog on the beach call for help when the dad gets stuck in the mud as the tide turns. S5, Ep16/20
Put the pleasure back into shopping from the comfort of your home and choose from a selection of innovative products.
Put the pleasure back into shopping from the comfort of your home and choose from a selection of innovative products.
A seven-year feud between two neighbours escalates and ends in court with incriminating video evidence of harassment and property damage. S21, Ep234
When a man misses a few car payments on a car he bought with his ex-girlfriend, she reports the vehicle as stolen; the Judge sets her straight. S21, Ep235
After a trip to Costa Rica, friends fight over unpaid travel expenses and unfair charges. S21, Ep236
A woman accuses the father of her child of skipping out on car payments because she filed for child support. S21, Ep237
When a child has scratches and a few too many bruises, a concerned father calls DCS on his son's mother; she says his claims were malicious. S24, Ep141
A woman claims her horse was neglected, beaten and malnourished while in the care of her former horse trainer. S24, Ep142
A man accuses his neighbour's horse of vandalism; she breaks down when he calls into question a Kickstarter for her cancer treatment. S24, Ep143
When a woman allegedly threatens her landlord in an angry rant, he files a TRO; she claims she was forced to live in a car while her children lived inside. S24, Ep144
A mother of eight, who was allegedly desperate to get her figure back, is sued by her ex-fiancé for a plastic surgery loan and for false charges filed with CPS. S18, Ep196
After a motorist is rear-ended by another driver, he claims a third car showed up at the scene and moved things before the police arrived. S18, Ep197
The Judge advises a defendant to stop giving her funny looks in a case involving alleged cheating, a personal loan, and a wrecked car. S18, Ep198
An elderly woman whose car was towed three times blames her poor vision on the fact that she can't register the vehicle. S21, Ep259
A woman alleges that a large, out-of-control dog ran into her car and damaged it; the dog's owner claims his pet was hit and injured by her vehicle. S21, Ep260
A woman demands that her Great Dane be returned after a long absence and an allegedly unnecessary medical procedure. S22, Ep1
A 9-year-old's birthday party ends in an alleged assault, bullying accusations and feuding mothers. S22, Ep2
A woman claims she was fired from her job after a good friend accused her of asking for kickbacks from insurance referrals. S22, Ep3
A man who took in his sick sister is surprised when she leaves her entire estate to a cousin; the cousin accuses him of theft. S22, Ep4
All hell breaks loose when a woman asks her mother to take care of her homeless friend's child. S22, Ep5
A woman in search of a rose-themed tattoo claims she sustained an injury and infection at a tattoo parlour and sues for damages. S24, Ep157
Judge Judy refuses to accept a young man's rehearsed answer after he is accused of stealing a friend's motorcycle and wrecking it. S24, Ep158
An unsuspecting, older couple get the shock of their lives when they are pulled over by police for driving an allegedly stolen vehicle. S24, Ep159
A man comes at his friend with a pipe after his motorcycle is allegedly slammed to the ground; his friend returns the violence with a knife. S24, Ep160
The Judge cites a study naming the top 'biting' dogs, as she mediates a case involving the mauling death of a Terrier by a Pit Bull mix. S24, Ep15
A man who fathered four children while disabled sues his landlord for allegedly poor living conditions, retaliation and harassment. S24, Ep16
A teenager accuses her 32-year-old ex-boyfriend of stealing her dog; Judge Judy threatens to take away his plane ticket home if he doesn't return it to her. S24, Ep17
When a woman is accused of slamming her car door into a parked vehicle, she resorts to claiming that the process server touched her inappropriately. S24, Ep18
After children deny involvement in vandalising a neighbour's car, Judge Judy imparts an invaluable lesson. S24, Ep19
A woman accused of stealing thousands from her cousin tries to clear her name by passing a polygraph test. S24, Ep20
The parents of a teenager are told that his ex-lover gave birth; she sends them pictures of a live newborn but then says she miscarried at nine months. S24, Ep21
A woman has the nerve to sue for a false arrest after trading a car which she still owed over 10K on; the new owners claim they were never told. S24, Ep22
A man is accused of lying to his landlord about his dog being a service animal; she says his pet destroyed her property. S24, Ep23
A woman hires her housekeeper to clean her entire house in exchange for furniture in her storage unit, but claims she took the wrong items. S24, Ep24
A woman claims her friend loves to donate money to help care for dogs in distress, so she owes her nothing. S24, Ep25
After being incarcerated for a year, a man comes home to find that his car has vanished; he thinks it's been repossessed, but an ex-friend claims it is rightfully hers. S24, Ep33
